title: Video Calling App
description: A WebRTC-based video chat application that enables users to create and join video rooms, participate in video/audio calls, and exchange messages in real-time.

title: Housing Service App
description: The Household Service Management System aims to create a platform that connects services professions with customer seeking home services.This system allows booking feature, rating feature ,multi-role feature ,search feature and category feature with implementation of CRUD with REST architecture.
